to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: switching to testing at install?
body:
Littlefield, Tyler wrote:
> This is rather slow on my connection. Is there any way to switch to testing at install?

     Sounds like Debian.  Can't you point  the net installer at testing 
from the start?  I thought there was a way to do that, possibly editing 
sources.list from another console before all the downloading starts? 
*Seems* doable...  Wish I could help more.

         Michael
